name: Glue42 Plugin
description:
Extension app that connects Symphony with Glue42 desktop integration platform, using the FDC3 open standard (Financial Desktop Connectivity and Collaboration Consortium).

FDC3 aims to provide an open standard for interoperability between applications on the financial desktop. More info on https://fdc3.finos.org/

Please note that Glue42 needs to be running on your desktop.
